title: Business & Finance
text:
Shares of Roblox surged more than 54% in their public debut, giving the videogame platform a market capitalization of about $45 billion.

---

The Dow rose 1.5% to a record 32297.02, its first close above 32000. The S&P 500 rose 0.6% and the Nasdaq slipped 0.04%.

---

Facebook asked a judge to dismiss antitrust lawsuits brought by the Federal Trade Commission and state attorneys general.

---

McKinsey said Bob Sternfels will take over as the consulting firm's global managing partner in July, succeeding Kevin Sneader , who failed to win a second term.

---

Credit Suisse removed its European head of asset management and two managers who worked on its Greensill supply-chain finance funds from their posts.

---

Gensler cleared a key hurdle to Senate confirmation as SEC chief, garnering support from two Republicans in a committee vote.

---

GameStop 's shares continued their wild ride, climbing to nearly $350 in intraday trading only to give up most of the gain.

---

Disney 's ESPN and the NHL struck a seven-year deal that will bring the Stanley Cup Finals to ABC and make hundreds of local-TV games available on ESPN+.
